member.name: M:DotNetOpenAuth.Messaging.MvcExtensions.AsActionResult(System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Wraps a response message as an MVC so it can be conveniently returned from an MVC controller's action method.

member.name: M:DotNetOpenAuth.Messaging.MvcExtensions.HttpResponseMessageActionResult.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:DotNetOpenAuth.Messaging.MvcExtensions.HttpResponseMessageActionResult.ExecuteResult(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext)
member.summary: Enables processing of the result of an action method by a custom type that inherits from the class.
member.param: The context in which the result is executed. The context information includes the controller, HTTP content, request context, and route data.
